snippet.title: Extraction Game Mode Preview | Season 5: Reckoning | Halo Infinite
snippet.description:
Halo 4’s Extraction game mode returns, reimagined and tuned for social as well as competitive gameplay in Halo Infinite! 

Each round begins with a neutral Extraction Site materializing at a random location on the map. Players, each equipped with an Extraction Device, must enter the site, and strategically plant their device within the zone to initiate the extraction process. 

Once an Extraction Device is planted, the device steadily accumulates extraction progress over time. But beware, enemy players can contest the zone and disrupt the extraction process. Teams score a point if they successfully complete the Extraction process. Once a Site is successfully extracted, it vanishes before reappearing elsewhere on the map for the next point. 

Halo Infinite's Extraction is the ultimate test of wit, speed, and teamwork in the ever-evolving world of Halo. Get ready to plant, protect, and prevail! 

Learn more here: https://aka.ms/ExtractionS5 

#haloreckoning #haloinfinite #halo  
---
